asset.author: charbroil
asset.hookText:
The Char-Broil TRU-Infrared Performance 2 Burner Gas Grill provides all of the features of larger grills with a more compact design which, allows for use in any sized space, big or small.  

Features:
- Two Burner Char-Broil TRU-Infrared cooking system
- 465 total square inches of cooking space
- Heavy duty folding side shelf for easy storage
- Appliance style cart with a stainless steel door for convenient accessory storage and tank access. 
- SureFire electronic ignition ensures a perfect start every time with an electronic spark at each burner 
- Precise cooking control with two grate-level temperature gauges
- Dual Fuel easily converts to natural gas

Visit http://www.charbroil.com for more information.
